title: Domain.com.au Property Scraper
description: Extract Australian real estate listings from Domain.com.au with comprehensive property details, prices, and market data

startUrl.title: Search URL
startUrl.description: Domain.com.au search URL to scrape properties from. Leave empty to use state/location filters or default Australia-wide search.

state.title: State/Territory
state.description: Select an Australian state or territory to search. Takes priority over startUrl when selected.

location.title: Location/Suburb
location.description: Specific suburb or location to search (e.g., 'sydney-nsw', 'melbourne-vic'). Takes priority over startUrl when provided.

minPrice.title: Minimum Price (AUD)
minPrice.description: Minimum property price in Australian Dollars.

maxPrice.title: Maximum Price (AUD)
maxPrice.description: Maximum property price in Australian Dollars.

sortBy.title: Sort Results By
sortBy.description: How to sort the search results.

maxResults.title: Maximum Properties
maxResults.description: Maximum number of property listings to collect (1-1000).

maxPages.title: Maximum Pages
maxPages.description: Maximum number of result pages to process (each page typically contains 20-30 properties).

collectDetails.title: Collect Full Property Details
collectDetails.description: Visit each property detail page for complete descriptions, photos, and inspection times. Increases runtime but provides comprehensive data.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Proxy settings for requests. Residential proxies strongly recommended to avoid blocking.
